pr_title: Created a Word / String Count Service for German/English

timeline.message: Created a Word Count Service for German/English
Created Unit Test for Word Count Service
Improved type safety of word count service
Added word count badge to text-assesment-area-component
Also included character counting into service and renamed service
Added new translation strings for character cound

timeline.author: madwau

replies.bodyText: SimpleChanges can also be imported from @angular/core.
replies.author: madwau

replies.bodyText: Thank you for the proposed changed! Looks much cleaner. I changed it in a337fc4
replies.author: stefanwaldhauser

timeline.bodyText: Instead of looping over the changes, you can do if (changes.submission) and then access the current value via changes.submission.currentValue.
timeline.author: madwau

replies.author: madwau

replies.bodyText: Looks much better. I also always forget about this nice destructuring :) Changed it in a337fc4
replies.author: stefanwaldhauser

timeline.author: madwau

replies.bodyText: Thank you! Did not know about readonly. Changed it in 5dfe0dd
